10#include <openssl/asn1.h>
11#include <openssl/pkcs7.h>
12#include <openssl/bio.h>
13
14#if !defined(OPENSSL_SYS_VXWORKS)
15# include <memory.h>
16#endif
17#include <stdio.h>
18
19/* Streaming encode support for PKCS#7 */
20
21BIO *BIO_new_PKCS7(BIO *out, PKCS7 *p7)
22{
23 return BIO_new_NDEF(out, (ASN1_VALUE *)p7, ASN1_ITEM_rptr(PKCS7));
24}
25
